Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and functionality tailored to meet your needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional product. I am confident that this price reflects its true value while also providing you with a reasonable opportunity to acquire it. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
